## Block.setPreviousStatement() method

Set whether this block can chain onto the bottom of another block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setPreviousStatement(newBoolean: boolean, opt_check?: string | string[] | null): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newBoolean | boolean | True if there can be a previous statement. |
|  opt\_check | string \| string\[\] \| null | _(Optional)_ Statement type or list of statement types. Null/undefined if any type could be connected. |

**Returns:**

void
